Package atlantis.framework

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDisposable
    An interface to dispose objects
    IDrawable
    An interface to draw objects on screen
    IUpdateable
    An interface to update object
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DrawableGameComponent
    A DrawableGameComponent is a GameComponent that is updated and drawn on each frame.
    Game
    The Game class provide basic initialization and game logic.
    GameComponent
    A GameComponent is a component that is updated on each frame.
    GameComponentCollection
    A GameComponentCollection is a container of GameComponent (and DrawableGameComponent) that is updated and drawn on each frame
    GameLoop
    The game loop
    GameTime
    Represents the time that elapses during the game
    MathHelper
    A class for helping in math operations.
    Matrix
    A matrix 4x4 Some methods has been ported from the open source project SharpDX.
    Point
    Define a two dimensional point
    Quaternion
    Define a quaternion.
    Rectangle
    Define a rectangle with coordinates and size
    Vector2
    Represents a 2-dimensional vector
    Vector3
    A Vector3 class that represent a vector with 3 coordinates X, Y and Z.
    Vector4
    Define a vector with four coordinates.
